import {Container,AppBar,Typography,Grow,Grid} from '@material-ui/core' import memories from './memories.png' import Form from './Form/Form.js' import Posts from './Posts/Posts.js' import useStyles from './styles' import {useEffect} from 'react' import {useDispatch} from 'react-redux' import {getPosts} from './actions/posts' function App() { const classes=useStyles() const dipatch=useDisptch() useEffect(() => { dispatchEvent(getPosts) }, [dispatch]) return ( Memories
); } export default App;
